name: James Gomez
description: Am James and was born in Germany and raised up in in the state.i went to school at College of Food Economics and Management – College of Economy and Management (FOM) – Food in Berlin to study business administration and now owning my business.my mum from state and dad from Germany,i lost my dad when i was 28 years of age,he died from a heart attack.i could remember the last days of my dad when he was telling me not to give up in this life.i asked why but told me to get him some water to drink i then went to get him the water but when i came dad was gone,he went away without saying good bye.some few months after my dad death i found a lady who’s name was Evelyn by then working in my mum school.i later got to no her well and marry her but she also passed out,she dead trwhen giving birth to my daughter ,after my wife died i have love to take my my only daughter and i take her any where i go and noe she is asking me to get on with life that i should get marry to another wife that’s why am here looking for my soul mate that will love me and and daughter.
